Class CardContentRestEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.colabproject.colab.api.rest.card.CardContentRestEndpoint

@Consumes("application/json")
@Produces("application/json")

extends Object

@Path("{id}")
public CardContent getCardContent​(@PathParam("id")

        Returns:
        the card content or null

@POST
public Long createCardContent​(CardContent cardContent)

        cardContent - the card content to persist
        Returns:

@Path("{id}/addDeliverableAtBeginning")
public Document addDeliverableAtBeginning​(@PathParam("id")
                                          Long cardContentId,
                                          Document document)
        Add the deliverable at the beginning of the card content.
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content
        document - the document to use as deliverable. It must be a new document
        Returns:
        the document newly created

      • addDeliverableBefore

        @POST
@Path("{id}/addDeliverableBefore/{neighbourDocId}")
public Document addDeliverableBefore​(@PathParam("id")
                                     Long cardContentId,
                                     @PathParam("neighbourDocId")
                                     Long neighbourDocId,
                                     Document document)
        Add the deliverable to the card content just before the given document.
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - the id of the card content
        neighbourDocId - the id of the document which will be just after the new document
        document - the document to use as deliverable. It must be a new document
        Returns:
        the document newly created
